property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: when this card attacks a Leader Card, draw 1 card. Awaken: When your life is at 4 or less: You may choose up to 2 of your energy, switch them to Active Mode, and flip this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When this card attacks, draw 1 card. Activate: Main: Once per turn G: Choose 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with an energy cost of 5 or less and KO it, then this card gains +5000 power for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with an energy cost of 4 or less and KO it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, choose up to 1 Son Gohan: Adolescence with an energy cost of 3 or less from your deck and add it to your hand, then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Double Strike. Permanent: Bond 3 (Namekian): Reduce the energy cost of this card in your hand by 2. Auto: When you play this card, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with an energy cost of 5 or less and KO it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: Bond 3 (Namekian): When you play this card, draw 1 card, then, you may choose up to 2 cards from your life and add them to yourhand. If you chose to add 1 or more cards to your hand, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and KO it.
